original:
The issue of untested Sexual Assault Kits (SAKs) remains a significant concern, as many kits continue to be stored without analysis. This situation has led to an increasing prevalence of unresolved cases, particularly as more kits are discovered each year.


Advancements in DNA analysis have provided new opportunities for examining old, unresolved cases that contain intact evidence. Every day, new DNA profiles are uploaded to the Combin
sampled:
The issue of untested Sexual Assault Kits (SAKs) remains a significant concern, as many kits continue to be stored without analysis. This situation has led to an increasing prevalence about unresolved cases, particularly as more kits are discovered each timeframe.


Advancements about DNA analysis have provided new opportunities of examining old, unresolved topics that contain intact evidence. Every day, new DNA profiles are uploaded to the Combin
